overview.key_finding: Century Games does NOT pre-announce features more than about one update cycle in advance. Content is announced via patch notes typically 1-2 days before release.
overview.closest_to_roadmap: Monthly Developer Feedback posts published since August 2023

official_channels.notes: Primary announcement channel — patch notes, state transfer schedules, event announcements
Update page posts patch notes for major updates
1.5M+ members, more player discussion than official announcements
Patch notes posted as image carousels

monthly_dev_feedback.description: The closest thing to a roadmap. Published monthly since August 2023 on X/Twitter, WoS Wiki News, and Century Games site.
jan_2026_highlights: Chat reply function for group/alliance chats
E10 buff timer pausing during movement-restricted events
Event schedule emails now show UTC + local time simultaneously
Discussion of rumors about new experts, T12 troops, and buildings (no confirmation)

server_timeline.note: NOT officially published by Century Games, but highly reliable because all servers follow the same pattern (+/- 7-21 days variance)

milestones.event: Tundra region opens; Polar Terror Level 3
Arena opponent pool enlarged by nearby servers
Gen 2 Heroes (Flint, Philly, Alonso); Legendary Hero Gear tier
Pets Gen 1 (Cave Hyena, Arctic Wolf, Musk Ox)
Fire Crystal Age begins (FC 1-3 at Furnace 30)
SvS (State of Power) and King of Icefield events begin
Gen 3 Heroes (Logan, Mia, Greg); VIP Prestige Shop (VIP 12)
Fire Crystal 4-5; Crystal Laboratory; Polar Terror Level 8
Legendary Chief Gear; Enhancement Material Exchange Shop
Gen 4 Heroes (Ahmose, Reina, Lynn); Hero Hall refresh
Fire Crystal 6-8; Refined Fire Crystals; Crystal Lab Level 6
Gen 7 Heroes (Edith, Gordon, Bradley); Charm Level 16; Charm Exchange Shop
Gen 9 Heroes (Magnus, Xura, Fred); Legendary T4 Gear

server_timeline.hero_gen_pattern: Hero generations arrive roughly every 80 days after Gen 2

event_rotation.notes: Alliance rally vs NPC; 2nd Bear Trap added Jan 2025
Alliance PvP, no permanent troop loss

community_tracking_sites.name: Whiteout Survival Wiki
community_tracking_sites.tracks: Most comprehensive: news, events, server timeline, hero data, patch notes

community_tracking_sites.name: WoS Tools
community_tracking_sites.tracks: Calculators, events guide with rotation schedules

community_tracking_sites.name: WhiteoutData
community_tracking_sites.tracks: Game mechanics, event details, hero data

community_tracking_sites.name: Vortex Gaming
community_tracking_sites.tracks: Dev feedback summaries, patch note analysis

community_tracking_sites.name: Polish WoS Site
community_tracking_sites.tracks: Interactive state timeline tool (enter your server)

recommendations.state_transfer_guide: Very valuable page — lots of nuance around pass costs, eligibility, transfer groups, and what you lose
recommendations.timeline_tracker: Harder since Century Games does not publish ahead, but community server timeline data could be embedded (enter your state number, see your timeline). Link to @WOS_Global for event announcements.
recommendations.best_interactive_reference: https://whiteoutsurvival.pl/state-timeline/ — Interactive tool where you enter your server and see your timeline
